name: Rob the Depths
description:
Rob the Depths is a grid-based roguelite where a guild of adventurers delve into the depths of a long abandoned dungeon in search of the rumored vast wealth that lies in the deepest levels.

Move slow or move fast, use your own traps or the treacherous environment, but always grab the loot and delve deeper.

Features

  • 4 distinct character classes, each with a special ability
  • Levels procedurally generated using binary space partitioning
  • A whole host of items, some to use, others to return to the surface, and even more to sell
  • A variety of enemies and environmental traps each with different effects and damage amounts
